Chuang Dong joins the Menger Lab!

Admin January 06, 2025

We are thrilled to welcome Chuang Dong as a Senior Bioinformatics Scientist in the Menger Lab at Gustave Roussy Institute (IGR) . Chuang joins us after six years of outstanding work under the mentorship of Dr. Milpied at Marseille-Lumniy Immunology Center (CIML). Welcome, Chuang!
